__e: Plenty of time to set up the husband
He's had his obsessions before, of course. But this goes a bit further than setting a man trap for Father Christmas.
He needed to lure out the real killer, and here you are.
Instead he tried to trick me into saving them, instead of you.
Listen, if you think you're gonna trick me into touching that thing, you're as crazy as he is.
I mean, if you can't get 'em for one thing, you get 'em for something else.
